characters: Driver of a black sedan, driver of a white sedan, driver of a black car
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a city road in rainy weather. The traffic light ahead is red, and several vehicles are waiting at the intersection. A black sedan is positioned in front of the observer vehicle, while a white sedan is seen moving from the right side lane to the left side lane, potentially causing a cut-in situation. Additionally, a black car on the left side is moving forward, possibly overtaking the observer vehicle.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while approaching the intersection. The vehicle is slowing down due to the red traffic light ahead and the presence of other vehicles. The observer vehicle is keeping a safe distance from the black sedan in front and is monitoring the white sedans movement from the right side lane.
key_objects: 1) Front: A black sedan, approximately 5 meters away, stationary at the intersection. 2) Right: A white sedan, approximately 3 meters away, moving from the right side lane to the left side lane, potentially causing a cut-in. 3) Left: A black car, approximately 2 meters away, moving forward, possibly overtaking the observer vehicle.
